Instruction: In a blender, combine frozen acai puree, frozen pineapple chunks, frozen mango chunks, and coconut water.
Blend until smooth and creamy, adding more coconut water if needed to reach desired consistency.
Pour the blended acai mixture into a bowl.
Top with granola, toasted coconut flakes, sliced kiwi, and sliced banana.
Serve immediately and enjoy the tropical flavors!
